Package io.enfire.cipher

Class Breaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.enfire.cipher.Breaker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CaesarBreakerOneKey, CaesarBreakerTwoKey
    public abstract class Breaker
extends Object
    This class includes basic decryption functionality for Caesar and Vigen√®re ciphers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected String alphabet
      26 lower case English alphabet.
      String decrypted
      This field will contain a message when the secret is successfully decrypted.
      protected Dictionary dictionary
      Breaker object will consult this dictionary to decrypt the secret.
      protected String freqLetters
      26 lower case English alphabet ordered by their descending frequencies.

      • calcKey

        protected int calcKey​(int freqCounterIndex,
                      int freqLetterIndex)
        Calculates the decryption key (0 - 26).
        Parameters:
        freqCounterIndex - Index of the most frequent letter of the frequency counter array.
        freqLetterIndex - Index of one of the letters of freqLetters.
        Returns:
        The decryption key.

      • isEnglish

        protected boolean isEnglish​(String text,
                            int threshold)
        Checks if the given decrypted text is valid English.

        Algorithm: Sort the words by length in descending order so that the longer words can be checked first because the small ones (articles, preposition, etc.) are not distinguishable from gibberish. Then, check word by word until it reaches a certain point where we can accept the validity of the text.

        Parameters:
        text - A decrypted text.
        threshold - Acceptance level of the text. Say, threshold is 2. If any 2 or more words of the text is not English, the whole text is not English.
        Returns:
        boolean validation result.

      • calcThreshold

        protected int calcThreshold​(String text)
        Calculates the threshold at which the program can decide that the decrypted text is not English.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to calculate the threshold of.
        Returns:
        Calculated threshold.
